name: The Rizers "Rise Up" CD
description:
The Rizers 2nd album "Rise Up" features verses like 2 Peter 3:18, Phil. 2:3-4, Psalm 136:2-4 and many more.  

*Pre-Order this album now and will ship on/around Oct. 12th, 2011.

Track Listing:
1. Psalm 100:1-2 (Make A Joyful Noise!)
2. Proverbs 3:5-6 (Trust In The Lord!)
3. 2 Peter 3:18 (Glory Glory Glory!)
4. 2 Timothy 3:16 (All Scripture!)
5. Philippians 2:3-4 (Do Nothing Out Of Selfish Ambition!)
6. Philippians 4:13 (I Can Do Everything!)
7. Psalm 136:2-4 (His Love Endures Forever!)
8. 2 Corinthians 5:17 (A New Creation!)
9. John 14:27 (Do No Be Afraid!)
10. Luke 18:16 (Let The Children Come To Me!)
11. The Rizers' Theme Song (Bonus Track)

name: "Make A Joyful Noise" DVD (The Music Video Collection)
description:
Our Brand New Music Video DVD!!!

The Rizers- Make A Joyful Noise DVD!  

This DVD features 10 sing-a-long music videos from The Rizers.  Each video includes words on the screen to help with Scripture memory.  

The DVD includes the following videos:
1. Psalm 100:1-2 (Make A Joyful Noise)
2. Proverbs 3:5-6 (Trust In The Lord)
3. Psalm 8:1 (How Majestic Is Your Name)
4. 1 John 4:7 (Let Us Love One Another)
5. John 3:16 (For God So Loved)
6. Psalm 136:2-4 (His Love Endures Forever)
7. 1 Thessalonians 5:15-18 (Wrong for Wrong) 
8. 2 Timothy 3:16 (All Scripture)
9. 2 Corinthians 5:17 (A New Creation)
10. 2 Peter 3:18 (Glory, Glory, Glory)

name: Tour God's Word With The Rizers VBS Kit
description:
Overview: 
A brand new vacation Bible school experience where God's Word and the Gospel get stuck in the hearts and minds of kids.  

"Tour God's Word with The Rizers" will use the books of Matthew, Mark, Luke & John for daily kid engaged Bible Tour lessons.  We will memorize Old and New Testament verses set to totally memorable Scripture songs from The Rizers.  The week will also include large and small group times &  "mini" concerts for parents!  All of this and more for a Heartful of God's Word!

Main Theme: A Heartful of God's Word

Daily Themes/Scripture:
Day 1- Heartful of Trust
           *Memory Verse: Proverbs 3:5-6
           *Bible Lesson: Peter & the net full of fish! 
Day 2- Heartful of Thanks
           *Memory Verse: Psalm 136:2-4
           *Bible Lesson: Jesus heals the lepers
Day 3- Heartful of Love
           *Memory Verse: John 3:16
           *Bible Lesson: The lost sheep
Day 4- Heartful of Prayer
           *Memory Verse: Luke 11:9-10
           *Bible Lesson: Bartimaeus Asks Jesus for healing
Day 5- Heartful of Praise 
           *Memory Verse: 2 Peter 3:18
           *Bible Lesson: Jesus talks about living water

Seeing kids come to a saving faith in Jesus Christ and grow in their walk with Him is our main jam! So hop on the tour bus and take your kids on a Vacation Bible Experience they will never forget!

Kit includes:
* Director's Tour Guide- Outlines for each event though out the day including "Tune Your Heart" opening & "Sing Your Heart Out" closing sessions, "Bible Tour" lessons, "Heart Strings" small group time, "Music Moves" Scripture memory time, craft, game, snack, & missions suggestions and more!

* Leader's Tour Guides

* DVD with 5 Sing-A-Long Scripture Song music videos from The Rizers w/ lyrics - (examples of our videos are available at http://www.youtube.com/therizers) 

* CD-Rom with digital assets including video files, posters, banners, registration forms, chord charts for the daily Scripture songs, website banners, logos, name tags, leaders guides, skit scrips, coloring sheets and more! 

* CD featuring the daily Scripture songs from The Rizers and includes instrumental versions with & without backgrounds for performance

* Promotional Posters

* The Rizers temporary tattoo sheet sampler

* Order Information for additional take home items (Tshirts, CD, The Rizers Temporary Tattoo Sheet)

* Missions Partnership with CURE International

* Access to The Rizers VBS website page for more suggestions and updates!

9. 2 Corinthians 5:17 (A New Creation)
10. 2 Peter 3:18 (Glory, Glory, Glory)
11. Psalm 100:1-2 (Make A Joyful Noise)- Instrumental
12. Proverbs 3:5-6 (Trust In The Lord)- Instrumental
13. Psalm 8:1 (How Majestic Is Your Name) - Instrumental
14. 1 John 4:7 (Let Us Love One Another)- Instrumental
15. John 3:16 (For God So Loved)- Instrumental

18. 2 Timothy 3:16 (All Scripture) - Instrumental
19. 2 Corinthians 5:17 (A New Creation)- Instrumental
20. 2 Peter 3:18 (Glory, Glory, Glory)- Instrumental

name: 1 Timothy 4:12 Screen Printed Poster
description:
"Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set and example for the believers in speech, in life, in love, in faith and in purity."  

One of our favorite verses ready for you to frame/hang in your room, sunday school room, school room, or your clubhouse!  The poster is 18"x24" and will be rolled and shipped in a tube.  

*it is printed on white paper, we slightly off colored it here to help with the visual of the poster.
